mapper.insert: insert into users (user_id, user_password, user_name, user_address, user_phone) values (#{userId}, #{userPassword}, #{userName}, #{userAddress}, #{userPhone})
mapper.select: select distinct d.sidoname, d.gugunName from dongCode as d left join interest as i on LEFT(d.dongcode, 5) = LEFT(i.dongcode, 5) where i.user_id = #{id} and d.dongname is not null

select i.apartmentName, b.dealAmount, b.area, b.floor, concat(b.dealYear,'.', b.dealMonth,'.', b.dealDay) date from housedeal as b left join houseinfo as i on b.aptCode = i.aptCode left join houselike as l on b.no = l.no where l.user_id = #{id}
